item.title: AWS authorize security groups across acounts « ShellRunner
item.description: Just had to share this post since I helped a little bit with it. Very handy little tip about authorizing security groups across AWS accounts. AWS authorize security groups across acounts « ShellRunner. It is a post by @jacksonmurtha so we can trust that it is good.
